original_text: If you refuse to let them go, you will have more trouble. If you still keep them in Egypt, 3 the Lord will punish you. He will send a very bad illness on all your animals. Your animals in the fields, your horses, donkeys, camels, cows, sheep and goats will all become very ill.
korean_text: 네가 만일 보내기를 거절하고 억지로 잡아두면

sentences.original_text: If you refuse to let them go
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 그들을 가지 못하게 하기를 거절한다면
당신은 더 많은 고통을 겪게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: If you still keep them in Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 계속해서 그들을 이집트에 붙잡아 둔다면

sentences.original_text: He will send a very bad illness
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 매우 심각한 질병을 보내실 것입니다
